venue.name: En la Escuela Polit√©cnica de Gij√≥n, Aulario Sur - Aula Magna

events.description:
üî• Firebase Asturias Day üî•
===========================
We are in luck that the #Firebase team is going to be in Madrid celebrating their #FirebaseSummit on September 26th. Some of them will be doing some Firebase roadshows in several cities across Europe. And we're happy to announce that Gij√≥n is among the cities they've chosen to visit on September 30th.

Firebase is Google's mobile platform that helps you quickly develop high-quality apps and grow your business. Easy to integrate on iOS, Android, and the Web. Ship cross-platform apps with ease. Firebase APIs are packaged into a single SDK so you can expand to more platforms and languages, including C++ and Unity, with Firebase as your unified backend. More information: https://firebase.google.com

AGENDA
>>18:00h - Meet n' greet
>>18:15h - TALK: Get to Know Firebase (Maximum 120 attendees)
Firebase enables app developers to build faster and easier with serverless products (like authentication, real-time databases, and web hosting). The Firebase platform can also help with app quality (like Crashlytics) and growing your app (like sliced audience feature distribution and messaging). Both prototype and production apps can take advantage of our toolkits for developing and growing your app. Come learn about how Firebase can help you with your hobby, startup, or even enterprise-level apps!
>>19:00h - BREAK
>>19:15h - CODELAB: Zero to App with Firebase (Maximum 50 attendees).
RSVP for the Codelab here ==> https://www.meetup.com/es-ES/GDG-Asturias/events/264559616)
Build a web app from scratch with Firebase and Stackblitz's online editor. We'll be using basic HTML and JavaScript to talk to Firebase. This is a great intro to using the Firebase console and integrating Firebase into an app. No extensive prior knowledge or software installations needed.
>>20.30h - Catering & Networking

SPEAKERS

>>RACHEL SAUNDERS
Rachel is a technical writer on the Firebase team at Google. Her main focuses are BaaS products (like Hosting and Cloud Functions), as well as app quality products (like Performance Monitoring and Crashlytics). She also works closely with the Firebase Console and CLI teams. One of her Firebase missions is to improve and streamline the Firebase onboarding process for developers. Before joining Google, Rachel enjoyed many career roles, from a teacher to a biotech researcher. She is passionate about helping people learn and feel successful.

>>ADITYA GAUTAM
Aditya is a Software Engineer working in Firebase at Google. He is primarily responsible for the development of the Firebase Predictions, which aims at predictions of churners, spenders, etc. He graduated from Carnegie Mellon University in 2016 and worked with Zillow as Machine Learning Engineer for a year before joining Google in 2018. He is very passionate about AI and its impact on the people.
https://www.linkedin.com/in/aditya-gautam-68233a30

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us at [masked] or Twitter https://www.twitter.com/gdgasturias

Thanks a lot!
The Google Developers Group Asturias Team

events.name: ::GDG Tech Sessions:: Building secure apps with Firebase
events.description:
Hi Developers!!

GDG Tech Sessions (http://tech-sessions.com/) is an adaptive way to support GDGs and other communities to share knowledge, helping them make the turn into digital events. Besides the fact that online events are the only way to keep our activity running, it is also an excellent mechanism to continue sharing knowledge. Therefore we join our efforts and share the events for all communities.
>>More Info: https://bit.ly/GDGTechSessions1

## WHAT WILL WE DISCUSS IN THIS EVENT?
In a world where security breaches make the front page of newspapers, how do you ensure high velocity without compromising application security? In this talk, we‚Äôll discuss some of the common threat models, and how Firebase can help you secure your apps. We‚Äôll share best practices for using Firebase Authentication, writing Security Rules for least privilege access. Finally, before we open it up for some Q&A, we‚Äôll also talk about some of the cool new features we‚Äôve recently released, to make it even easier to Secure Your App.

##FIREBASE
Firebase is Google‚Äôs client-side application development platform, with a mission to help app developers of all sizes succeed with their products.

Firebase accomplishes this by taking common problems that occur during a product‚Äôs lifecycle and making them easier to solve, be it by providing more information about your products, or providing tools to handle complex problems like security or network connectivity when storing data.

##SPEAKER
Megha (https://twitter.com/megha) is an engineering lead at Google working on making Firebase awesome. With many years of experience in distributed systems infrastructure and mobile technologies, Megha has built everything from SIEM platforms to messaging systems. She focuses on helping Firebase users securely engage with, and delight, their end-users. A Bay Area native, Megha received her Master of Arts in CS from Oxford University.

##AGENDA
19:00 ‚Äî Tech Session Presentation by Host GDG Madeira
A brief introduction to the initiative, with the participation of the promoters, showing useful data.

19:05 ‚Äî Guest GDG introduction: WTM Spain
A brief introduction to the guests GDG, GDG leaders and speakers.

19:10 ‚Äî Talk: Building secure apps with Firebase by Megha Bangalore, Lead Engineer at the @Firebase team.

20:10 ‚Äî Discussion panel, Q&A

The Q&A is intended to be made by the public along with the session, not only at the end ‚Äî the most upvoted questions will be answered.

20:15 ‚Äî Final remarks

If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact us at [masked] or Twitter https://www.twitter.com/gdgasturias & https://twitter.com/dscepig.

Thanks a lot!
GDG Asturias & Developers Student Club Equi EPI Gij√≥n teams ;-)
